Package com.jatrix.core

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jatrix.core.Matrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Iterable<Double>
    public class Matrix
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Iterable<Double>
    Matrix class is used as a representation of a simple matrix

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Matrix​(double[][] matrix)
      A basic constructor, receiving an array of some type T .
      Matrix​(int size)
      Constructs a Matrix object, received a size, which is a quantity of rows and columns simultaneously.
      Matrix​(int size, double val)
      Constructs a Matrix object, which has size by size dimensions and fills a matrix with some value val.
      Matrix​(int row, int col)
      Constructs a Matrix object, received a number of rows and columns.
      Matrix​(int row, int col, double val)
      A basic constructor, used for creating a matrix row x col size with filled values of val parameter

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(int row,
              int col)
        Constructs a Matrix object, received a number of rows and columns.
        Parameters:
        row - - number of matrix rows.
        col - - number of matrix columns.
        Throws:
        MatrixSizeException - if row or column of a matrix is equaled or less than zero.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(int row,
              int col,
              double val)
        A basic constructor, used for creating a matrix row x col size with filled values of val parameter
        Parameters:
        row - number of matrix rows.
        col - number of matrix columns.
        val - some value, which is filler of matrix.
        Throws:
        MatrixSizeException - if row or column of a matrix is equaled or less than zero.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(double[][] matrix)
        A basic constructor, receiving an array of some type T .
        Parameters:
        matrix - - a filled matrix of type T .
        Throws:
        MatrixSizeException - if number of columns are not equaled to each other.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(int size)
        Constructs a Matrix object, received a size, which is a quantity of rows and columns simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        size - quantity of rows and columns simultaneously.
        Throws:
        MatrixSizeException - if row or column of a matrix is equaled or less than zero.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(int size,
              double val)
        Constructs a Matrix object, which has size by size dimensions and fills a matrix with some value val.
        Parameters:
        size - matrix order or a number of rows and cols simultaneously.
        val - value to fill the matrix.
        Throws:
        MatrixSizeException - if row or column of a matrix is equaled or less than zero.

        public boolean isSquare()
        Return boolean result, checking if a matrix is square (number of rows and columns must be equals).
        Returns:
        boolean true if a matrix is pair (quantity of rows and columns must be same) and false elsewhere.

      • identity

        public Matrix identity()
        A method for converting the matrix to identity matrix.
        Returns:
        current matrix, converted to identity matrix (a matrix with ones on the main diagonal and zeros elsewhere).

      • getTranspose

        public Matrix getTranspose()
        Transposes some matrix. It means the following operation:
        Let's suppose we have a matrix, which we need to transpose:
        | 1 | 2 | | 1 | -5 | 2 | A =| -5 | 7 | , so the transposed matrix looks like this At = | 2 | 7 | 1 | | 2 | 1 |
        Returns:
        transposed matrix of the specified matrix.
